name: The lost joystick
description:
Are you ready to go in a dark world, to take back the thing you're loving most?
We're not talking about your family, your beloved, your soul...
No! We're talking about your JOYSTICK!
You cannot play with your console without it!

So, dive into an adventure and fight against monsters and weird creatures to take back what you need to play your videogames!

Have fun!

GAME SPEC
- 10 different and completely explorable Levels
- Dozens of monsters
- 2 different endings
- 2 old style FMV

CONTROLS
KEYBOARD: WASD or ARROW KEYS: Move left and right, go down and jump
SPACEBAR: Jump
GAMEPAD: Directional Buttons or Left Analog stick: Move left and right, go down
BUTTON A/B: Jump
